**vowels** vs. <span style="color:green"><b>consonants</b></span> vs. <span style="color:blue"><b>glides</b></span><br>
- **vowels** - no obstruction
- <span style="color:green"><b>consonants</b></span> - with complete obstruction
- <span style="color:blue"><b>glides</b></span> - with partial obstruction <br><br>

**vowel articulation**
- tongue <span style="color:green"><b>height</b></span> (high, mid, low)
- tongue <span style="color:green"><b>backness</b></span> (front, central, back)
- lip <span style="color:green"><b>roundness</b></span> (rounded, unrounded)<br><br>

**other vowel features**
- <span style="color:orange"><b>nasalisation</b></span>
- <span style="color:orange"><b>vowel length</b></span>
- <span style="color:orange"><b>pitch</b></span> (tone, etc)
]

## **Categories to Differentiate Consonants**
<br>
<div style="text-align:center;">
<img src="../pic/1114/ipacons.png" width="70%">
</div>
<br>

<span style="color:deeppink"><b>columns</b></span> - <span style="font-variant: small-caps; color:green">place</span> - where the obstruction of airflow in the vocal tract is<br><br>
<span style="color:deeppink"><b>row</b></span> - <span style="font-variant: small-caps; color:green">manner</span> - what type of obstruction of airflow occurs<br><br>
in a <span style="color:deeppink"><b>single cell</b></span> - <span style="font-variant: small-caps; color:green">voicing</span> - whether the vocal cords vibrate or not (the right is <i>voiced</i>)<br><br>

<div style="text-align:center;">
  <a href="https://www.ipachart.com"><span style="color:deeppink"><b>IPA clickable chart</b></span></a>
</div>

## **Place of Articulation**
### (where the obstruction is in the vocal tract)
<br>
.pull-left[
- **labials**: lips
  - <span style="color:blue">bilabials</span>: both <span style="color:green">lips</span> **[b, p]**
  - <span style="color:blue">labio-dentals</span>: the <span style="color:green">lower lip</span> and <span style="color:green">upper teeth</span> **[f, v]**<br><br>
- **coronals**: between the tongue tip/blade and the **front** part of the mouth
  - <span style="color:blue">dentals</span>: tongue and <span style="color:green">teeth</span> **[θ, ð]**
  - <span style="color:blue">alveolars</span>: tongue and <span style="color:green">alveolar ridge</span> **[t, d]**
  - <span style="color:blue">post-alveolars</span>: tongue and the space right behind <span style="color:green">alveolar ridge</span> **[ʃ, ʒ]** <br><br>
- **retroflexes**: the <span style="color:green">tongue tip</span> is arched backward **[ʈ, ɖ]**
]
.pull-right[
<div style="text-align:center">
<img src="../pic/1114/th.jpg" width="90%">
</div>
]

---
## **Place of Articulation**
### (where the obstruction is in the vocal tract)
<br>
.pull-left[
<div style="text-align:center">
<img src="../pic/1114/glottal.jpg" width="90%">
</div>]
.pull-right[
- **palatals**: tongue body raised against the <span style="color:green">hard palate</span> **[j]**<br><br>
- **velars**: tongue back against the <span style="color:green">soft palate (velum)</span><br>**[k, g]**<br><br>
- **guttrals**: pronounced in the very back of the mouth (around the <span style="color:green"> throat</span> area)
  - <span style="color:blue">uvulars</span>: tongue back against the <span style="color:green">uvula</span><br>**[q, ʀ]**
  - <span style="color:blue">pharyngeals</span>: root of tongue obstructing the <span style="color:green">pharynx</span> **[ħ,ʕ]**
  - <span style="color:blue">glottals</span>: <span style="color:green">vocal folds</span> close the <span style="color:green">glottis</span> **[ʔ]** <br><br>

]

---
## **Manner of Articulation**
### (what type of obstruction of airflow occurs)
<br>
.pull-left[
**complete blockage of airflow**<br><br>
- <span style="color:green">stops/plosives</span> **[p/b, t/d, k/g]**
  - stops can be **aspirated** (with a [h] sound after the obstruction is released) 
  - **[p<sup>h</sup>, p]** ([p<sup>h</sup>ejs], [spejs]) <br><br>
- <span style="color:green">trills, taps/flaps</span> **[r, ʀ, ɾ]**
  - obstruction doesn't last long enough to cause a **release of pressure** at the end <br><br>
]
.pull-right[
<img src="../pic/1114/manner.jpg" width="75%">
]

---
## **Manner of Articulation**
### (what type of obstruction of airflow occurs)
<br>
.pull-left[
**partial blockage of airflow**<br><br>
- <span style="color:blue">fricatives/plosives</span> **[ʃ, ʒ]**<br><br>
- <span style="color:blue">approximants/plosives</span> **[ɹ]**
  - less obstruction than **fricatives**<br><br>
- <span style="color:blue">laterals/plosives</span> **[l]**
  - obstruction in the center, but air flows past the tongue on the side(s)
]
.pull-right[
<img src="../pic/1114/manner2.jpeg" width="100%">
]

---
## **Manner of Articulation**
### (what type of obstruction of airflow occurs)
<br>
.pull-left[
airflow blocked in **one part** of the vocal tract but flow through **a different part**<br><br>
- <span style="color:orange">affricates</span> **[t͡ʃ, d͡ʒ]** ???[d͡ʃ]
  - a combination between stops and fricatives<br><br>
- <span style="color:orange">nasals</span> **[m, n, ŋ]**
  - complete obstruction through the oral cavity but air is **redirected** to flow through the nasal cavity
]
.pull-right[
<img src="../pic/1114/empty.jpeg" width="80%">
]

---
## **Manner of Articulation**
### (what type of obstruction of airflow occurs)
<br>
.pull-left[
<img src="../pic/1114/101.jpg" width="90%">
]
.pull-right[
further grouping into **sound class**<br><br>
- <span style="color:deeppink">rhotics</span>: **<i>r</i>**-like sounds **[ɹ, ɻ, r, ʀ, ɾ, ɽ, ʁ...]**<br><br>
- <span style="color:deeppink">liquids</span>: <span style="color:green">rhotics</span> and <span style="color:green">laterals</span><br><br>
- <span style="color:deeppink">obstruents</span>
  - consonants with **more** obstruction
  - <span style="color:orange">stops</span>, <span style="color:orange">fricatives</span>, <span style="color:orange">affricates</span><br><br>
- <span style="color:deeppink">sonorants</span>
  - consonants with **less** obstruction
  - <span style="color:blue">nasals</span>, <span style="color:blue">liquids</span>, <span style="color:blue">approximants</span>
]

Give a full description for **voicing**, <span style="color:green"><b>place</b></span>, and <span style="color:blue"><b>manner</b></span> of **each consonant** in the following words and give the corresponding **IPA** symbol: <br><br>
.pull-left[

<span style="color:white">move-----</span><b>[v]</b>: **voiced** <span style="color:green"><b>labio-dental</b></span> <span style="color:blue"><b>fricative</b></span><br><br>
cloth<span style="color:white">------</span><b>[k]</b>: **voiceless** <span style="color:green"><b>velar</b></span> <span style="color:blue"><b>stop</b></span><br>
<span style="color:white">cloth------</span><b>[l]</b>: **voiced** <span style="color:green"><b>alveolar</b></span> <span style="color:blue"><b>lateral approximant</b></span><br>
<span style="color:white">cloth------</span><b>[θ]</b>: **voiceless** <span style="color:green"><b>dental</b></span> <span style="color:blue"><b>fricative</b></span><br><br>
gosh<span style="color:white">------</span><b>[g]</b>: **voiced** <span style="color:green"><b>velar</b></span> <span style="color:blue"><b>stop</b></span><br>
<span style="color:white">gosh------</span><b>[ʃ]</b>: **voiceless** <span style="color:green"><b>post-alveolar</b></span> <span style="color:blue"><b>fricative</b></span><br><br>
]
.pull-right[
hide<span style="color:white">------</span><b>[h]</b>: **voiceless** <span style="color:green"><b>glottal</b></span> <span style="color:blue"><b>fricative</b></span><br>
<span style="color:white">hide------</span><b>[d]</b>: **voiced** <span style="color:green"><b>bilabial</b></span> <span style="color:blue"><b>stop</b></span><br><br>

<span style="color:white">stove-----</span><b>[t]</b>: **voiceless** <span style="color:green"><b>alveolar</b></span> <span style="color:blue"><b>stop</b></span><br>
<span style="color:white">stove-----</span><b>[v]</b>: **voiced** <span style="color:green"><b>labio-dental</b></span> <span style="color:blue"><b>fricative</b></span><br><br>
bank<span style="color:white">------</span><b>[b]</b>: **voiced** <span style="color:green"><b>bilabial</b></span> <span style="color:blue"><b>stop</b></span><br>
<span style="color:white">bank------</span><b>[ŋ]</b>: **voiced** <span style="color:green"><b>velar</b></span> <span style="color:blue"><b>nasal</b></span><br>
<span style="color:white">bank------</span><b>[k]</b>: **voiceless** <span style="color:green"><b>velar</b></span> <span style="color:blue"><b>stop</b></span><br><br>
